hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.php$'; then vendor/bin/php-cs-fixer fix --quiet "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null; echo 'formatted'; fi
vendor/bin/phpstan analyse --no-progress --error-format=raw 2>&1 | head -10; python3 -m py_compile strands_agents/api/server.py 2>&1; python3 -m py_compile strands_agents/agents/__init__.py 2>&1
